Review Details: Very powerful gaming machine, but I highly recommend u to use cooling pads, as temperature rise above 100degrees .I was playing uncharted 4 in highest possible settings, I could easily get 60+ fps, but the CPU temp reached 100degrees.Another thing I noticed is the hinges are poor quality,i don't get the robust feel in it, it's been just 1 month and the hinges feel like I have opened and closed it for years and made it loose

Review Details: Excellent product great performance and build quality. I wish they could have packed this device with a 1tb SSD. Otherwise, I am satisfied with this product

Product Name: Lenovo Legion 5 Intel Intel Core i7 11th Gen 11800H - (16 GB/512 GB SSD/Windows 11 Home/4 GB Graphics/...
Review Details: Great product at this price. I have been an Intel user since long and this is my first AMD laptop. It seriously packs a good punch when it comes to gaming. RTX 3060 with a 165 hz screen and 16GB ram works like a charm. No major heating issues as the fans work well. Have been playing God of War, AC Valhalla on Ultra and it is smooth. Only con I noticed is the sound by Nahimic is pretty low and you have literally put it on full volume. Also storage is 512GB SSD which is a downgrade for laptops...

Product Name: Lenovo Legion 5 Intel Intel Core i7 11th Gen 11800H - (16 GB/512 GB SSD/Windows 11 Home/4 GB Graphics/...
Review Details: It is a lovely looking machine  ....but it is too early to say anything about it is performance and hardware.
